data.actual_result: The webcam toggles on when selecting Voice & Video
data.expected_result: The webcam light does not toggle until you are viewing your webcam
data.short_description: Webcam Indicator Light turns on Early
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Video Share (or use a friend to open the settings) - Have a webcam with a indicator light whenever it's being used - Goto Voice & Video Settings
